actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1055.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7098 to authorize appropriations for atmospheric and climate activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the fiscal year 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7098 (authorizes appropriations for atmospheric and climate activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, fiscal year 1981).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7098 to authorize appropriations for atmospheric and climate activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the fiscal year 1981, and for other purposes.
